pages.text: 39|57|Huo shuo:“Jiaruo an la yindao wo, wo biding shi jingwei zhe.”
39|58|Huo zai kanjian xingfa de shihou, shuo:“Dan yuan wo de fanhui chenshi, namo, wo yao bian cheng xingshan zhe.”
39|59|Buran! Wo de xuduo jixiang, que yi lailin ni, dan dou bei ni fourenle, ni wangzizunda, ni bian cheng yige bu xindao zhe.
39|60|Fuhuo ri, ni jiang kan dao wumie an la de ren mianse bian hei. Nandao huo yu li meiyou zi da zhe de zhuchu ma?
39|61|An la zhengjiu jingwei zhe tuoli kunan, bing shi tamen huode chenggong, tamen bu zao huohuan, ye bu youchou.
39|62|An la shi chuangzao wanwu de, yeshi jianhu wanwu de;
39|63|tiandi de yaoshi, zhishi ta de; buxin an la de jixiang zhe, cai shi kui she de.
39|64|Ni shuo:“Wuzhi de ren a! Nandao nimen jiao wo chongbai an la yiwai de shenling ma?”
39|65|Ni he ni yiqian de ren, dou feng dao qishi shuo:“Ruguo ni yi wu pei zhu, ze ni de shangong, biding wuxiao, er ni biding chengwei kui she zhe.
39|66|Buran! Ni yingdang zhi chongbai an la, ni ying dang zuo ganxie zhe.”

39|67|Tamen meiyou qieshi di renshi an la. Fuhuo ri, dadi jiang quanbu wo zai ta de quantou zhong, zhu tian jiang juan zai ta de youshou zhong. Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong qu pei ta de!
